title: OT26: Au Bon Thread
summary:
Key ideas:
- Scott shares his experience of being efficient and productive by maintaining a structure.
- He emphasizes the importance of sticking to routines and schedules to increase productivity.
- Scott recommends making a list of things to do every day and prioritizing them based on importance.

Key learnings:
- A structured approach to productivity can help individuals to manage their time more effectively.
- Prioritizing tasks based on importance can help in completing them on time.
- Consistency and discipline are key to maintaining a structure.

Key questions:
- How can one overcome the challenges of maintaining a structure?
- Are there any downsides to being too structured?
- How can one incorporate flexibility into their routines to avoid monotony?
